statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model_name=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); output_style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); dir_name=$(basename "$current_dir"); git_branch=$(cd "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); git_status=$(cd "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null && git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' '); if [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then if [ "$git_status" -gt 0 ]; then git_info=" ⚡ $git_branch ($git_status)"; else git_info=" ⚡ $git_branch"; fi; else git_info=""; fi; printf "\033[2m%s \033[36m%s\033[39m%s \033[33m[%s]\033[0m" "$model_name" "$dir_name" "$git_info" "$output_style"
